name: Muhammad Sameem
bio: A JavaScript Dev (MERN Stack + React Native) & Instructor. I am a philanthropist, tech & and open-source lover. My dream is to give Free Education and build a community & platform that revolves around it. I always try to come up with unique and different project ideas that are for community use. Always open to collaboration on projects

milestones.title: React Developer
